# analystrpc 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of analystrpc is to provide some utility functions that can automate some work for junior analysts.  

## Installation

You can install analystrpc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pfc5098/analystrpc")
```
